content:
ITEM NO.37                 COURT NO.13                 SECTION IV-A
               S U P R E M E  C O U R T  O F  I N D I A
                       RECORD OF PROCEEDINGS
SPECIAL LEAVE PETITION (CIVIL) Diary No.30866/2025
[Arising out of impugned final judgment and order dated 31-01-2025
in CMP No. 196/2024 passed by the High Court of Karnataka at
Bengaluru]
THE MANAGING DIRECTOR, BANGALORE METROPOLITAN TRANSPORT CORPORATION
Petitioner(s)
                                VERSUS
M/S. BSR INFRATECH INDIA LTD. BENGALURU & ANR.        Respondent(s)
IA No. 146828/2025 - CONDONATION OF DELAY IN FILING
 
Date : 07-07-2025 This matter was called on for hearing today.
CORAM : 
         HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE RAJESH BINDAL
         HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE R. MAHADEVAN
For Petitioner(s) : Mr. Balaji Srinivasan, AOR
                   Mr. Vishwaditya Sharma, Adv.
                   Ms. Kanishka Singh, Adv.
                                      
For Respondent(s) : 
          UPON hearing the counsel the Court made the following
                             O R D E R
Delay condoned.
No case is made out for interference with the impugned order.
The special leave petition is, accordingly, dismissed.
Pending application(s), if any, shall also stand disposed of.
(KRITIKA TIWARI)                                (SAPNA BANSAL)
SENIOR PERSONAL ASSISTANT                     COURT MASTER (NSH)
